## isJsonArray() function

Test if an `unknown` is potentially a [JsonArray](./ts-json-base.jsonarray.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isJsonArray(from: unknown): from is JsonArray;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  from | unknown | The <code>unknown</code> to be tested. |

**Returns:**

from is [JsonArray](./ts-json-base.jsonarray.md)

`true` if the supplied parameter is an array object, `false` otherwise.
